## Recipe Submission

### Checklist

- [ ] Frontmatter fields filled out (`title`, `description`, `author`, `prep_time`, `cook_time`, `servings`, `calories`, `keywords`)
- [ ] `recipe_category` and `recipe_cuisine` set
- [ ] Ingredients section with measurements
- [ ] Instructions section with numbered steps
- [ ] Notes section (optional but encouraged)
- [ ] No external links in the recipe body
- [ ] Ran `chef submit` lint check (if using Claude Code)
